import React from 'react' function PizzaBlock({price, title, imageUrl, types, sizes, rating, category, id}) { const [pizzaCount, setPizzaCount] = React.useState(0); const [activeType, setActiveType] = React.useState(0); const [activeSize, setActiveSize] = React.useState(0); const onClickAdd = () => { setPizzaCount(pizzaCount +1) } const typeName = ['тонкое', 'традиционное'] return (

{title}

    {types.map((typeId, i)=>
  • setActiveType(typeId)} className={activeType === typeId ? 'active' : ''}>{typeName[typeId]}
    • )}
    {sizes.map((size, i)=>
  • setActiveSize(size)} className={activeSize === size ? 'active' : ''}>{size} см.
    • )}
от {price} ₽
) } export default PizzaBlock
